TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceViewSchemaConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 为表示数据源架构中的字段的属性提供一个类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter for a property representing a field in a data source schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类将在赋值前的对象类型转换为控件属性。Use the class to convert object types before assignment to a control property. 一般情况下，支持字符串对象类型进行转换，并提供可用于分配给关联的控件属性的标准值的列表。In general, the supports converting string object types and supplies a list of standard values available for assignment to the associated control property. 标准值集合是用于当前控件的数据源架构中的字段列表。The standard values collection is the list of fields in the data source schema for the current control. 若要支持其他对象类型进行转换，从派生类并重写和对其他对象类型的方法。To support converting additional object types, derive a class from and override the and methods for the additional object types. 若要支持的标准可分配值的自定义列表，请重写方法。To support a custom list of standard assignable values, override the method. 将应用属性指定类作为控件属性的类型转换器。Apply the attribute to specify the class as the type converter for a control property. 例如，的属性类和的属性类使用为属性类型转换器。For example, the property of the class and the property of the class use the as the property type converter. > [!NOTE] > 您永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器对象。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例。For more information, see the examples in . 方法指示此转换器支持返回可用值通过一系列方法。The method indicates that the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法指示列表不是可能的值的独占列表。The method indicates that the list is not an exclusive list of possible values.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 您永远不应直接访问的类型转换器。You should never access a type converter directly. 相反，通过调用适当的转换器对象。Instead, call the appropriate converter by using a object. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例。For more information, see the examples in .

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

summary.span: 指示指定的源类型是否可转换为关联控件属性的类型。

span.span: Indicates whether the specified source type can be converted to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 如果转换器能执行转换，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法，以确定是否方法支持将转换的源类型。Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type. 方法可以将转换只能从一个字符串，因此方法将返回`true`时`sourceType`是一个字符串。The method can convert only from a string, so the method returns `true` when `sourceType` is a string.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

summary.span: 将指定对象转换为关联控件属性的类型。

span.span: Converts the specified object to the type of the associated control property.

returns.span: 一个 实例，表示已转换的对象。

span.span: An instance that represents the converted object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`是一个字符串，则的字符串表示形式`value`返回。If `value` is a string, then the string representation of `value` is returned. 如果`value`是`null`，空字符串 ("") 返回。If `value` is `null`, an empty string ("") is returned. 对于所有其他指定的值，引发异常。For all other specified values, a exception is thrown. 调用方法，以确定是否方法支持将转换的源类型。Call the method to determine whether the method supports converting the source type.

span.span: The conversion could not be performed.
Design-Time Architecture

summary.span: 返回可以分配给控件属性的可用值的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to a control property.
Design-Time Architecture

summary.span: 返回可以分配给关联控件属性的可用值的列表。

span.span: Returns a list of available values that can be assigned to the associated control property.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含可以分配给关联控件属性的值。

span.span: A containing available values for assignment to the associated control property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用指定的属性`context`对象，以获取实现。The method uses the property of the specified `context` object to obtain an implementation. 如果实现可用，它用来在设计时访问关联控件的数据源架构和关联的数据源架构视图中检索可用字段的列表。If the implementation is available, it is used to access the data source schema for the associated control at design time and retrieve the list of available fields from the associated data source schema view. 从关联控件的数据源架构中的字段生成可用值的集合。The collection of available values is built from the fields in the data source schema for the associated control.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回`false`，，该值指示列表返回的方法不是所有可能的分配值的独占列表。The method for a returns `false`, indicating that the list returned by the method is not an exclusive list of all possible assignable values.

summary.span: 指示在指定的上下文内，此转换器是否返回一组可以分配给控件属性的值。

span.span: Indicates whether this converter returns a set of available values for assignment to a control property within the specified context.

returns.span: 如果此转换器返回一组可以分配给关联控件属性的值，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: if this converter returns a standard set of available values for assignment to the associated control property; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法指示转换器是否支持返回可用值通过一系列方法。The method indicates whether the converter supports returning a list of available values through the method. 方法对象返回`true`如果指定`context`对象提供中的实现其属性。The method for the object returns `true` if the specified `context` object supplies an implementation in its property. 方法使用实现，以检索关联的数据源架构中的可用字段列表。The method uses the implementation to retrieve the list of available fields from the associated data source schema.

span.span: Design-Time Architecture
